data.quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.
data.author: Johannes Brahms

data.quote: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
data.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

data.quote: I pay no attention whatever to anybody's praise or blame, I simply follow my own feelings.
data.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

data.quote: Inspiration is an awakening, a quickening of all man's faculties, and it is manifested in all high artistic achievements.
data.author: Giacomo Puccini

data.quote: Works of art make rules; rules do not make works of art.
data.author: Claude Debussy

data.quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
data.author: Leonard Bernstein

data.quote: I am hitting my head against the walls, but the walls are giving way.
data.author: Gustav Mahler

data.quote: I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well.
data.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

data.quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.
data.author: John Cage

data.quote: Imagination creates reality.
data.author: Richard Wagner

data.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.
data.author: B.B. King

data.quote: Those who have achieved all their aims probably set them too low.
data.author: Herbert Von Karajan

data.quote: I accept chaos, I'm not sure whether it accepts me.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: The truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't goin' away.
data.author: Elvis Presley

data.quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.
data.author: Kurt Cobain

data.quote: Everything is scary if you look at it. So you just got to live it.
data.author: Mary J. Blige

data.quote: My heroes are the ones who survived doing it wrong, who made mistakes, but recovered from them.
data.author: Bono

data.quote: To listen is an effort, and just to hear is no merit. A duck hears also.
data.author: Igor Stravinsky
